document.full_text: two of the national league's best pitchers matched each other pitch-for-pitch until the florida marlins manufactured a run in the eighth inning for a 2-1 win over their divisional rival philadelphia phillies on tuesday.
document.title: marlins edge phillies 2-1 in pitchers' duel
lines_and_colors: two of the national league's best pitchers matched each other pitch-for-pitch until the florida marlins manufactured a run in the eighth inning for a 2-1 win over their divisional rival philadelphia phillies on tuesday.
